mapper.select: select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name , m.perms ,m.remark , m.sortOrder,m.action,m.menu_type from sys_menu m left join sys_rolemenu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_roleuser ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_role ro on ur.role_id = ro.role_id where ur.user_id =#{user_id} and m.menu_type='menu' order by m.sortOrder
